plant.title: Boston Fern
plant.summary: The Boston Fern (Nephrolepis exaltata) is a timeless and elegant houseplant, celebrated for its lush, feathery fronds and air-purifying qualities. It adds a touch of classic botanical beauty to any indoor space, instantly creating a serene and verdant atmosphere. Pet owners can rejoice, as this popular fern is completely non-toxic to cats and dogs, making it a safe choice for homes with furry friends. While it prefers high humidity and consistent moisture to truly flourish, its stunning appearance and pet-friendly status make the Boston Fern a rewarding addition for those willing to provide a bit of extra care. Its dense foliage also offers a cozy hideaway for playful cats.
